question: A government-appointed committee has recently proposed to establish ‘National Institute of Valuers’. Who is the head of the committee?
explanation:
The Government of India has constituted a committee of experts in August 2019, to suggest measures on an institutional framework for regulation and development of valuation. The committee was headed by the Chairperson of Insolvency and Bankruptcy Board of India (IBBI), M S Sahoo.
Recently, the committee submitted the 'Draft Valuers Bill, 2020' and suggested to establish a National Institute of Valuers. Union Corporate Affairs Ministry has recommended to set up the proposed institute.
